name: Martian Scout
description:
Martian Scout is a game about exploration. You only can go forward using your thruster. If you stop pushing forward you'll go backwards. Avoid the obstacles from the space and reach Mars!

This game was made during the GMTK Jam and due time limitations the game is VERY SHORT but I hope you enjoy the few minutes it takes to reach the end :)

Controls:
Space / Mouse LB / Touch -> accelerate

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Beauty Flow" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
